title: Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
OB: When expanding the Data Source in the Available Items sector by clicking the related icon, the observed behavior is not mentioned.
EB: The expected behavior is that both table icons and column icons should show up when expanding the Data Source in the Available Items sector.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the software.
2. Navigate to the Available Items sector.
3. Expand the Data Source by clicking the related icon.
4. Verify that the column icons do not show up.
